urls.title: EASA EU-LAC project "EU-Latin America Cooperation on Civil Aviation"
urls.description: The EU-LAC project is funded by the European Union and implemented by the European Aviation Safety Agency. The project will develop and support European and Latin America interests in Civil Aviation, with a focus on RSOOs.

urls.description: Dear users, due to maintenance reasons, eTendering will be shortly unavailable on 24/11/2021 between 19:00 and 23:59 (Luxembourg time). We apologise for the inconvenience. urls.title: EASA releases agenda and videos ahead of 2021 EASA Rotorcraft and VTOL Symposium | EASA
urls.description: The European Union Aviation Safety Agency will be holding its 2021 EASA Rotorcraft and VTOL Symposium on November 16-17, 2021.
